name: Takeoff from Birmingham (Lufthansa CRJ700)
description:
Onboard Lufthansa CityLine CRJ700 D-ACPE for pushback, engine start, taxi and climb out from Birmingham to Dusseldorf on a beautiful clear spring day. We start our engines before taxying out to runway 33 and taking off, getting a great view of Birmingham and Coventry on our way to cruising altitude from seat 16F.

✈ ✈
Equipment used:

Camera: GoPro Hero4 Silver http://goo.gl/Wz7Uxt
Mount: Generic suction mount http://goo.gl/E2vRBs
Swivel Mount: http://goo.gl/vWQVne
Boya Frame Case for GoPro: http://goo.gl/tqM3H1
Battery: Anker E7 25600mAh  http://goo.gl/ZXfxOy
MicroSD cards: Sandisk 128GB http://goo.gl/KDjm4Y
